content: originally published in crochet charm with famous dmc cottons in 1950 **approximate finished sizes ** * large doily 12 inches * medium doily 8-1/2 inches * small doily 5-1/2 inches **materials ** * dmc crochet superba art 163 size 30 white ecru ivory or colors 3 balls * steel crochet hook size 6 **gauge ** 4 shell rnds = 1 inch archive link 1 1 http //web archive org/web/20071212170016/http //www angelfire com/folk/celtwich/shelldoilyset html
